name: Registration
description: The patient has completed the registration process at the front desk and their information is entered into the system.

name: Triage
description: The triage nurse has finished assessing the patient's condition and assigned a triage level.

name: Bed Assigned
description: The patient has been assigned a bed in the emergency department.

name: Nurse Assessment
description: The nurse has completed the initial assessment of the patient in their assigned bed.

name: Doctor Examination
description: The doctor has finished examining the patient and recorded their findings.

name: Diagnostic Test Ordered
description: The doctor has ordered one or more diagnostic tests for the patient (e.g., blood test, imaging).

name: Blood Test Performed
description: A blood test has been performed on the patient and the sample has been sent to the lab.

name: Imaging Performed
description: An imaging test (such as X-ray or CT scan) has been performed on the patient.

name: Test Results Available
description: The results of the ordered diagnostic tests are now available in the system.

name: Treatment Administered
description: The patient has received treatment, medication, or a procedure as ordered by the doctor.

name: Observation
description: The patient has completed a period of observation in the emergency department.

name: Specialist Consultation
description: A specialist has completed their consultation with the patient.

name: Disposition Decision Recorded
description: The doctor has recorded the decision regarding the patient's next steps (discharge, admission, or transfer).

name: Discharged
description: The patient has been discharged from the emergency department and has left the facility.

name: Admitted to Hospital
description: The patient has been admitted to an inpatient ward for further care.

name: Transferred to Another Facility
description: The patient has been transferred to another healthcare facility for further treatment.
